Workflow.Name: Review Hub - Feature Request Notification
Workflow.Description:
This flow sends a notification to both the Review Hub Feature Team and the individual who made the request using Review Hub when the state of the Request is updated to a point that is relevant to either party.
Flow failure would prevent either party from receiving updates on the feature request.

Description.description:
